Description.Text:
The Valentn Marieta is a perfect place to spend your vacation with your whole family or as a couple. It is situated only 150 m away from the Playa del Ingls and although it is located in the centre, the hotel unites tranquillity and a great variety of spare time activities. In the outside area of the hotel there is a spacious swimming pool for adults and children. You can relax at the terrace drinking a cocktail from our Snack bar next to the swimming pool. We also have your children in mind. The kids have the opportunity to participate in one of the activities offered by our own animation team. If you like to relax in a different way you can go up to the roof of the hotel. There you can find a solarium and a terrace from where you can enjoy spectacular views over the surrounding country side of the island. Within only a few minutes you can reach the wonderful sand beaches or the attractive free time activities of the vivid holiday region. Due to its proximity to the African continent the winters are very mild and the pleaseant temperatures make Gran Canary to an ideal place to also spend your holidays in the winter season.
ROOMS The hotel, partially renovated in 2003, has a total of 128 Apartments, distributed over 4 floors. The apartments can occupy up to 4 people and the majority has sea view. From the balcony you can admire unforgettable sunsets and sunrises. Every apartment has a bed room, a separate living room with sofa bed and a fully equipped bathroom, and kitchenette.
Telephone, Satellite TV (pay channels as well as free TV), Radio, Safety deposit box with charge, Ventilator at the ceiling, Hair dryer, Balcony or terrace
SERVICE Air Condition in the Buffet Restaurant Internet Corner Car hire Small supermarket Souvenir shops 1 outdoor pool for adults, 1 outdoor pool for children Sun terrasse with lounger and umbrellas (free of charge) Snack Bar / Restaurante Reception with multilanguage staff (Spanish, English, German, French, Italian, Portugues, Dutch) TV room Games room Pool Billard, Ping - Pong, Darts, Excursions, Bicycle hire Childrens animation Animation: Flamenco Shows, Spanish lessons, Games Medical Service

The Valentn Marieta is located in the district of San Bartolom de Tirajana. Only 150 m away from the hotel, between the beach of San Agustn and the beach of Mas Palomas, you will find the Playa del Ingles (4 km long), which is famous for its nature park and its dunes. Here you can relax in truly idyllic surroundings or participate in many of the water sport activities offered by local professionals.

STANDARD - APARTMENT - Especially suitable for family vacation, but also for couples. Fantasitc view over the Atlantic ocean, with its unforgettable sunsets and sunrises. Every Apartment has a seperate Bedroom and living room with a sofa bed
The apartments are spacious and comfortable, with a sitting-room/day bed and a separated bedroom, provided with telephone, bathroom and terrace.
